ogp.framework.gui.camera

Class SimpleCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • ogp.framework.gui.camera.Camera
      • ogp.framework.gui.camera.SimpleCamera

  • public class SimpleCamera
extends Camera
    A simple camera located at a particular point in the world, and with the given screen size. This camera displays the world, unscaled, at the screen origin.
